srclib


srclib was made in the pursuit of building Sourcegraph, a code search engine for developers. Faced with keeping the code to ourselves or releasing it to the public, we open sourced the entire library for the greater developer community.

It is with our purest intensions that we hope you use it to make programming easier, better, and more insightful.

Please contact us directly with any additional thoughts.
